name: Usage must not be negative
message: The usage value must never be negative.

name: Return must not be null
message: The return value must be filled and cannot be null.

name: EAN must be 18-digit numeric
message: EAN values must always be 18-digit numeric strings.

name: Return must not be negative
message: The return value must not be negative.

name: Conditional return for SDS source
message: If the source is SDS, the return value must be filled.

name: Mutual non-negativity of usage and return
message: Usage and return cannot both be negative simultaneously.
